title: pure_happiness_inside
author: pure_happiness_inside
content: Sam bankman Fried is testifying today without a Jury. The judge sent the jury home and wants him to testify privately first. We will never know what he says today. What do you think this means?https://www.coinfeeds.io/daily/sam-bankman-fried-testifies-without-jury

comments.author: franky1
comments.body: the jury were out of the room YESTERDAY. but spectators were still able to sit in court. many who attended spoke about what he said and how evasive he was about many questions.however today SBF is being question with the jurors present.

comments.author: Bananington
comments.body: Well, he has been found guilty, even though he continued to claim not guilty, he is just awaiting judgement now. It is a win for the affected.and a lesson to others like him.https://www.cbsnews.com/news/sam-bankman-fried-trial-verdict/
